# Wining and dining at the AGH University Campus – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/wining-and-dining-at-the-agh-ust-campus/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:23:57

Welcome Point
 > 
Campus life

Wining and dining at the AGH University Campus

Wining and dining at the AGH University Campus

Within a few minutes walking:

Bistro Studio (restaurant) – 
https://goo.gl/maps/U3KVJaZnypGz8SGs8

BGH Craft Beer
 –  local craft beer brewed at the AGH University

Stołówka Studencka „Pod Lewiatanem” (restaurant) – 
https://goo.gl/maps/4AwNdmjfBi1ZATB78

Pizzeria Babilon (restaurant) – 
https://g.page/Pizza-Babilon?share

Restauracja Krakus (restaurant) – 
https://goo.gl/maps/YY5ut3D6uf5Rt9c9A

Many shops and bakeries:

Buczek

Awiteks

Żabka

Avita

Carrefour Express
